# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
- Burner mining drill and other furnaces at various positions

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab and nearby chests for storing science packs

### Electricity distribution network
Consists of small electric poles at various positions, including (x=2.5, y=2.5), (x=4.5, y=5.5), and (x=-3.5, y=14.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the pipe connection points are not occupied by other entities before attempting to connect pipes
- Make sure to specify the correct pipe type (e.g., Prototype.Pipe or Prototype.UndergroundPipe) when connecting entities

### Errors when setting research
- Ensure that the research technology is valid and available for research before attempting to set it
- Check that the lab has the necessary science packs to conduct the research

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure that the entity has enough space to hold the items before attempting to insert them
- Check that the inserter is configured correctly to insert items into the entity

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity
- Check that the entity can be placed on the specified tile (e.g., some entities may require a specific type of tile)
